title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. VII, pt. 200 - FRANCHISE OFFERINGS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. VII, pt. 200 - FRANCHISE OFFERINGS
State Regulations
§ 200.1 - Definitions
§ 200.2 - Contents of franchise offering prospectus
§ 200.3 - Franchise prospectus registration application
§ 200.4 - Rules concerning denial, suspension or revocation of franchise sales agent registrations
§ 200.5 - Amendments to franchise offering prospectus
§ 200.6 - Impoundment of funds
§ 200.7 - Rules concerning exemptions
§ 200.8 - Annual report requirements
§ 200.9 - Filing of sales literature
§ 200.10 - Exemptions from registration
§ 200.11 - Registration of franchise sales agents
§ 200.12 - Exemption from filing requirements of franchise advertising on the Internet
§ 200.13 - Unregistered franchise offers over the Internet

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. VII, pt. 200

Statutory authority: General Business Law, art. 33, §
694[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
